title: A Force of Nature: The Female Writer's Journey with Rebecca Christiansen
description:
In my continued journey towards understanding the feminine, I speak with Rebecca Christiansen on how her writing interacts and is informed by womanhood. We also discuss female vs male preferences for reading and why there is often a negative attitude towards female centric fiction in our culture

Podcast version: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/A-Force-of-Nature-The-Female-Writers-Journey-with-Rebecca-Christiansen-eeabli

Check out Rebecca's books:
https://www.amazon.ca/Maybe-Paris-Rebecca-Christiansen/dp/1510708804
https://www.wattpad.com/831060566-we-make-mayhem-✔%EF%B8%8F-boyxboy-chapter-one
Follow Rebecca on Twitter: @rebeccarightnow
Follow me on Twitter: @AnderaLynnLewis
Write me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
